effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dig, this move will hit with double power.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dig, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.

flavor_text.black_white: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.
